channel.title: Need Shield of Arrav Partner! Black Arms Side
channel.description:
Hey guys I need a Shield of Arrav partner for the Black Arms Side! I have the whole Pheonix side done with the weapons store key in hand and ready to give. :) Sooo close to the end, and this is my last free quest aside from dragon slayer. Reply to this thread or pm me ingame @ A Wild Nolan
I will be home in about 10 hours from this post to play.

item.title: Need Shield of Arrav Partner! Black Arms Side

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

check on the osr forums there is a thread dedicated to this.
